rooms.description: Welcoming entry with wheelchair accessibility, minimal stairs replaced with ramp.
Open space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light; accessible seating areas.
Fully accessible kitchen design with open shelving and wheelchair-friendly cabinetry.
Accessible bathroom with grab bars and ample turning space.
Dedicated home office space integrated with natural light and ergonomic design, ensuring wheelchair access.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window for Mediterranean style and natural illumination.
